attributes.additional_details:
We have observed that blonde people are becoming very rare to be seen, therefore we decided to go around and do research of our own. We found that most of those surveyed agreed fully and had noticed the same phenomenon.
Science shows that as we become a more global society the recessive blonde gene is being lost in the gene pool; which is a case for concern. To keep the variety of people, this fact needs to be acknowledged and people should be made aware of the decline in this demographic.
attributes.background: We would like you to raise awareness of the fact that the blonde population, due to having a recessive gene, is dying out.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for designating specific days, such as this.
